newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: One-month to one-year Saudi t-bill rates mixed.
newsitem.headline: One-month to one-year Saudi t-bill rates mixed.

text.p: Yields on one-month to one-year Saudi treasury bills were mixed on Tuesday, bankers said.
The yield on 28-day bills maturing on April 3 were steady at 5.3585 percent and the rate on 91-day bills maturing on June 5 were also unchanged at 5.4836 percent.
The yield on 182-day bills maturing on September 4 rose to 5.6097 percent from 5.5444 percent and the rate on 364-day bills maturing on March 5 climbed to 5.9034 percent from 5.7302.
The bills were priced at 99.58496, 98.63281, 97.24219 and 94.36190 respectively.
One-month interbank deposit rates were quoted at 5-1/2, 3/8 percent, three months were at 5-5/8, 1/2, six months were at 5-3/4, 5/8 percent and one year were at 6-1/16, 5-15/16 percent.
